verses.roman:
cintita ha-ila sabe prabhure nā dekhiyā
prabhu cāhi' bule sabe deuṭī jvāliyā

synonyms: cintita ha-ila—became very anxious; sabe—all the devotees; prabhure—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nā dekhiyā—not seeing; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; cāhi'-searching for; bule—wander; sabe—all of them; deuṭī—lamp; jvāliyā—lighting.
translation: All the devotees were very anxious when they saw that the Lord was not in His room. They wandered about searching for Him with a warning lamp.
